name: 3 Dots - Connect Em All!
description:
3 Dots - Connect Em All! is challenging matching puzzle game, connecting the balls of same color to crush them.

This game is full of surprises and endless fun to solve challenging puzzles and help to relax after stressful studying and working hours. Sharpen your mind with so many different levels that little by little increase puzzle difficulty.

Enjoy your time and train your brain in 3 Dots color puzzle game!



How to play and become a matching master?

Hold and swipe your finger across adjacent same colored blocks to connect dots.

Clear the dots with same color to crush them and to kill them all.

Make the longest chains and break them to complete the level faster.

You need to achieve the objective before time run out!



Game Features:

500+ Exciting levels with moves and time features

Enjoy a variety of colored balls

6+ Boosters to help you connect the dots faster to complete the level

Easy to control with the simple tap and fun to play yet challenging to master!

Collect em all - clear the dots

Play FREE matching games classics for adults and kids anytime & anywhere
